```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = bill_length_mm, color = species)) +
  geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.8) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, aes(color = species), linetype = "dashed") +
  labs(
    title = "Bill Length vs. Flipper Length in Penguins",
    subtitle = "Separated by Species",
    x = "Flipper Length (mm)",
    y = "Bill Length (mm)",
    color = "Species",
    caption = "Data: palmerpenguins package"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    legend.position = "top"
  )
```
